summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 3 high-priority features for Notre Dame d'Autan parish website: 1) Contact form on /secretariat, 2) Mobile modal display, 3) Mobile hamburger navigation. All features working perfectly.
passed_tests: Contact form on /secretariat page: All 4 fields (name, email, subject, message) are present with proper data-testid attributes
Contact form validation: Uses HTML5 required attribute for validation
Contact form submission: Successfully submits to POST /api/contact and shows 'Message envoyé !' success message with green checkmark
Backend contact API: POST /api/contact returns 200 with proper response structure (id, name, email, subject, message, created_at, read)
Backend validation: Returns 422 for missing required fields
Mobile modal display (375px viewport): Modal opens correctly, slides up from bottom on mobile (items-end sm:items-center working)
Mobile modal fits viewport: Modal width = 375px matches viewport perfectly, no overflow
Mobile modal scrollable: Content area is scrollable with overflow-y-auto
Mobile modal close button: X button visible at top right, 'Fermer' button visible at bottom - both functional
Mobile hamburger menu: Hamburger icon visible and clickable on mobile viewport
Mobile menu opens: Menu slides in with all 5 main sections visible (Je veux..., Notre Dame d'Autan, Familles & Jeunesse, Demander un Sacrement, Grandir dans la Foi, Solidarité & Écoute)
Mobile menu accordion: Sections expand/collapse correctly with chevron animation
Mobile menu submenu navigation: Clicking submenu items (e.g., 'Secrétariat & Coordonnées') navigates to correct page and closes menu
Mobile menu styling: pb-24 padding at bottom, overscroll-contain working, larger tap targets (py-2.5) visible
seed_data_creation: TEST_ prefixed contact messages created during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 high-priority features verified working: 1) Contact form fully functional with validation and backend storage, 2) Mobile modals display correctly at 375px viewport with slide-up animation, scrollable content, visible close buttons, 3) Mobile hamburger navigation works with accordion sections and proper navigation. Backend contact API at POST /api/contact stores messages in MongoDB contact_messages collection.
